Title: Hideous Kinky
Actors: Kate Winslet, Saïd Taghmaoui, Bella Riza, Carrie Mullan
Plot: Hideous Kinky is the story of two sisters (seven and five years old) traveling with their hippie mother from London to Morocco. They encounter many adventures, new experiences, and interesting culture as they tag along on their mother's search for freedom and love. It is told through the eyes of the youngest girl, and we learn her observations on life, Mum, and determined sister, Bea.
Production: Greenpoint Films, Film Consortium, L Films
